markdownRemark.excerpt: Given an array of integers nums sorted in ascending order, find the starting and ending position of a given target value. Your algorithm's…
markdownRemark.html:
Given an array of integers nums sorted in ascending order, find the starting and ending position of a given target value.

Your algorithm's runtime complexity must be in the order of O(log n).

If the target is not found in the array, return [-1, -1].

Example 1:

Input: nums = [5,7,7,8,8,10], target = 8
Output: [3,4]

Example 2:

Input: nums = [5,7,7,8,8,10], target = 6
Output: [-1,-1]

frontmatter.title: [LeetCode 34] Find First and Last Position of Element in Sorted Array
